```{r}
# define covid date
breaks <- c(as.Date("2019-01-01"),as.Date("2019-12-31"),# 1=pre-covid, 2=exclusion
            as.Date("2020-04-01"), as.Date("2021-12-31"),# 3= covid time
            max(df1$date)) # NA exclusion

df1=df1%>%mutate(covid=cut(date,breaks,labels = 1:4))

df1=df1%>% filter(covid==1 | covid==3)
df1$covid= recode(df1$covid, '1'="0", '3'="1") # precovid=0, covid=1
df1$covid <- factor(df1$covid, levels=c("0","1"))

df2=df2%>%mutate(covid=cut(date,breaks,labels = 1:4))

df2=df2%>% filter(covid==1 | covid==3)
df2$covid= recode(df2$covid, '1'="0", '3'="1") # precovid=0, covid=1
df2$covid <- factor(df2$covid, levels=c("0","1"))

df3=df3%>%mutate(covid=cut(date,breaks,labels = 1:4))

df3=df3%>% filter(covid==1 | covid==3)
df3$covid= recode(df3$covid, '1'="0", '3'="1") # precovid=0, covid=1
df3$covid <- factor(df3$covid, levels=c("0","1"))

df4=df4%>%mutate(covid=cut(date,breaks,labels = 1:4))

df4=df4%>% filter(covid==1 | covid==3)
df4$covid= recode(df4$covid, '1'="0", '3'="1") # precovid=0, covid=1
df4$covid <- factor(df4$covid, levels=c("0","1"))

df5=df5%>%mutate(covid=cut(date,breaks,labels = 1:4))

df5=df5%>% filter(covid==1 | covid==3)
df5$covid= recode(df5$covid, '1'="0", '3'="1") # precovid=0, covid=1
df5$covid <- factor(df5$covid, levels=c("0","1"))

df6=df6%>%mutate(covid=cut(date,breaks,labels = 1:4))

df6=df6%>% filter(covid==1 | covid==3)
df6$covid= recode(df6$covid, '1'="0", '3'="1") # precovid=0, covid=1
df6$covid <- factor(df6$covid, levels=c("0","1"))
```

1. UTI
```{r}

```




5. otitis externa




```{r message=FALSE}

(est1.1 <- cbind(Estimate = coef(m1.1), confint(m1.1)))

(est3.1 <- cbind(Estimate = coef(m3.1), confint(m3.1)))
(est4.1 <- cbind(Estimate = coef(m4.1), confint(m4.1)))

```


## predictor: time.since

### estimate- coefficient
```{r message=FALSE}
## combine results
# covid
DF=bind_rows(est1.1[7,],est2.1[7,],est3.1[7,],est4.1[7,],est5.1[7,],est6.1[7,])
DF$Infection=c("UTI","URTI","LRTI","Sinusitis","Otitis externa","Otitis media")
#reorder
DF=DF%>%arrange(Infection)

names(DF)[1]="coefficient"
names(DF)[2]="ci_l"
names(DF)[3]="ci_u"

DF1=DF
DF1
rm(DF)
```

### exp(estimate)- IRR
```{r message=FALSE}
### calculate IRR & 95%CI
exp1.1=exp(est1.1)
exp2.1=exp(est2.1)
exp3.1=exp(est3.1)
exp4.1=exp(est4.1)
exp5.1=exp(est5.1)
exp6.1=exp(est6.1)
```

# prevalent


```{r message=FALSE}

# import incident cases
df = read_csv(here::here("output","redacted","consultation_rate_prevalent_check.csv"))

# define covid date
breaks <- c(as.Date("2019-01-01"),as.Date("2019-12-31"),# 1=pre-covid, 2=exclusion
            as.Date("2020-04-01"), as.Date("2021-12-31"),# 3= covid time
            max(df$date)) # NA exclusion

df=df%>%mutate(covid=cut(date,breaks,labels = 1:4))

df=df%>% filter(covid==1 | covid==3)
df$covid= recode(df$covid, '1'="0", '3'="1") # precovid=0, covid=1
df$covid <- factor(df$covid, levels=c("0","1"))


# infection counts, population size, covid period
df= df%>% group_by(date, covid,indic)%>% 
  summarise(counts=sum(counts), 
            population=sum(population))

# month for adjust seasonality
df$month=format(df$date,"%m")
df=df%>% mutate(season= case_when( month=="03"|month=="04"|month=="05" ~ "spring",
                                   month=="06"|month=="07"|month=="08" ~ "summer",
                                   month=="09"|month=="10"|month=="11" ~ "autumn",
                                   month=="12"|month=="01"|month=="02" ~ "winter"))
df$month=relevel(as.factor(df$season),ref="spring")
# time elapsed(measurement time point) for linear effect of time to capture long-term behaviour trends
df$times <- as.numeric(as.factor(df$date))

# time sequnece after covid
df=df%>% group_by(covid)%>%mutate(time.since=1:n())
df$time.since <- ifelse(df$covid==0,0,df$time.since)


df1=df%>%filter(indic=="UTI")
df2=df%>%filter(indic=="LRTI")
df3=df%>%filter(indic=="URTI") 
df4=df%>%filter(indic=="sinusitis")
df5=df%>%filter(indic=="otitis externa")
df6=df%>%filter(indic=="otitis media")

nrow(df1)
nrow(df2)
nrow(df3)
nrow(df4)
nrow(df5)
nrow(df6)

```

```{r message=FALSE}

# import incident cases

            as.Date("2020-04-01"), as.Date("2021-12-31"),# 3= covid time
            max(df$date)) # NA exclusion

df=df%>% filter(covid==1 | covid==3)
df$covid= recode(df$covid, '1'="0", '3'="1") # precovid=0, covid=1
df$covid <- factor(df$covid, levels=c("0","1"))


# infection counts, population size, covid period
df= df%>% group_by(date, covid,indic)%>% 
  summarise(counts=sum(counts), 
            population=sum(population))

# month for adjust seasonality
df$month=format(df$date,"%m")
df=df%>% mutate(season= case_when( month=="03"|month=="04"|month=="05" ~ "spring",
                                   month=="06"|month=="07"|month=="08" ~ "summer",

# time elapsed(measurement time point) for linear effect of time to capture long-term behaviour trends
df$times <- as.numeric(as.factor(df$date))

# time sequnece after covid
df=df%>% group_by(covid)%>%mutate(time.since=1:n())
df$time.since <- ifelse(df$covid==0,0,df$time.since)


df1=df%>%filter(indic=="UTI")
df2=df%>%filter(indic=="LRTI")
df3=df%>%filter(indic=="URTI")
```

# model plot
## coefficient
```{r}
DF1$group="overall"
DF2$group="prevalent"
DF3$group="incident"
DF=bind_rows(DF1,DF2,DF3)
DF$group=factor(DF$group,levels=c("overall","incident","prevalent"))
DF$Infection=factor(DF$Infection, levels=c("URTI","LRTI","Sinusitis","Otitis externa","Otitis media","UTI"))

```



```{r message=FALSE}
### Model2_result
#setting up the basic plot
p <- ggplot(data=DF, aes(y=group, x=coefficient,color=group))+ 
#this adds the effect sizes to the plot
geom_point()+ 

#adds the CIs
geom_errorbarh(aes(xmin=ci_l, xmax=ci_u))+

#adding a vertical line at the effect = 0 mark
geom_vline(xintercept=0, color="black", linetype="dashed", alpha=.5)+
#tematic stuff
theme_bw()+
#theme(text=element_text(family="Times",size=18, color="black"))+
#theme(panel.spacing = unit(1, "lines"))+
labs(
      title = "Consultation Recovery",
    x="Coefficient(95% CI)",
    y=""
  )+
facet_grid(Infection~., scales = "free", space = "free")+
 theme(strip.text.y = element_text(angle = 0),
   axis.title.y =element_blank(),
        axis.text.y=element_blank(),
       axis.ticks.y=element_blank(),
       legend.title=element_blank(),
       legend.position="bottom")
p
```

## IRR
```{r}

DF1.exp$group="overall"
DF2.exp$group="prevalent"
DF3.exp$group="incident"
DF=bind_rows(DF1.exp,DF2.exp,DF3.exp)
DF$group=factor(DF$group,levels=c("overall","incident","prevalent"))
DF$Infection=factor(DF$Infection, levels=c("URTI","LRTI","Sinusitis","Otitis externa","Otitis media","UTI"))

```



```{r message=FALSE}
### Model2_result
#setting up the basic plot
p2 <- ggplot(data=DF, aes(y=group, x=IRR,color=group))+ 
#this adds the effect sizes to the plot
geom_point()+ 

#adds the CIs
geom_errorbarh(aes(xmin=ci_l, xmax=ci_u))+

#adding a vertical line at the effect = 0 mark
geom_vline(xintercept=1, color="black", linetype="dashed", alpha=.5)+
#tematic stuff
theme_bw()+
#theme(text=element_text(family="Times",size=18, color="black"))+
#theme(panel.spacing = unit(1, "lines"))+
labs(
      title = "Consultation Recovery",
    x="IRR (95% CI)",
    y=""
  )+
facet_grid(Infection~., scales = "free", space = "free")+
 theme(strip.text.y = element_text(angle = 0),
   axis.title.y =element_blank(),
        axis.text.y=element_blank(),
       axis.ticks.y=element_blank(),
       legend.title=element_blank(),
       legend.position="bottom")
p2
```

```{r}
             fmt = 1,
             statistic = 'conf.int',

             stars = TRUE,
             exponentiate = TRUE)
```
